pages.text: Since all crops, tree crops, berries and whatnot require randomTicks, it needs to be ticked to grow. Also animals require ticks to grow, eat, drop manure etc.

So i strongly suggest you use a chunkloader of some sort. FTB Chunks is one good option which can simulates randomTicks. But for server owners: strongly suggest setting force_load_mode: "always" because if the player is offline randomTicks will not work on the crops thus crops will not grow at all.
